content: this pattern is free on my youtube channel 1 material yarns dmc happy cotton yellow 1 skein 20gr white orange red green small amount embroidery thread scheepjes maxi sweet treat black hook 2 5 mm stuffing polyfill cotton wool etc needle scissors pins pink blush for the cheeks the size of the doll will vary depending on the yarn used if you use the same materials as me the finished size is 8 cm gauge 7 stitches and 6 row = 2 5 cm 1 inch this information is important as it may affect to the color change every pattern i sell has been tested and proof-read but if you have any questions please message me i d be more than happy to help you 1 https //www youtube com/@khuccay
